items.name: Douglas Big Top Circus
items.short_description: A traditional circus experience under a vibrant big top, featuring acrobats, clowns, and animal-free acts. Enjoy the magic and thrill!

items.name: Marina Puppet Play
items.short_description: Intimate puppet shows featuring classic tales and new adventures, performed by skilled puppeteers. Perfect for younger children.

items.name: Clownfish Comedy Circus
items.short_description: A splashy, underwater-themed circus with acrobatic 'fish', juggling 'crabs', and hilarious 'clownfish' acts. Unique and vibrant!
items.address: The Fun Palace, Promenade, Douglas, IM1 2BX

items.name: Storybook Puppet Workshop
items.short_description: Watch an enchanting puppet show, then join a workshop to create your own puppet character to take home.
items.address: Community Hall, Finch Road, Douglas, IM1 2PT

items.name: Splashdown Douglas
items.short_description: An indoor water park with slides, splash pads, and a lazy river, perfect for year-round aquatic fun for all ages.

items.name: Pirate's Cove Water Playground
items.short_description: A swashbuckling outdoor water playground with pirate ship structures, cannons, and mini slides, designed for younger adventurers.

items.name: Douglas Reef Rapids
items.short_description: Experience thrilling water slides and a large wave pool, mimicking the exciting currents of a coral reef. For older kids and brave youngsters.

items.name: Toddler Tidal Pool
items.short_description: A safe, shallow water area with gentle fountains, sprinklers, and small slides, specifically designed for toddlers and very young children.
items.address: Victoria Road Leisure Centre, Douglas, IM2 4AW

items.name: Douglas Brick Kingdom
items.short_description: An expansive indoor park filled with millions of LEGO bricks, offering building zones, giant models, and interactive displays.

items.name: Mini-Builder's Yard
items.short_description: A hands-on construction park where kids can operate mini excavators, cranes, and diggers in a safe, sand-filled environment.
items.address: South Quay Industrial Estate, Douglas, IM1 5AT

items.name: Technic City Workshop
items.short_description: Focuses on advanced construction with Technic sets, offering workshops for kids to build working robots, vehicles, and contraptions.

items.name: Duplo Farm Adventure
items.short_description: A colourful and spacious area dedicated to Duplo, where toddlers can explore farm-themed builds, soft play, and creative zones.
items.address: Douglas Community Centre, Broadway, Douglas, IM2 4EW

items.name: Douglas Mini Zoo
items.short_description: Home to a variety of small and exotic animals, offering engaging talks and feeding demonstrations throughout the day.

items.name: Petting Farm at Glen Gardens
items.short_description: A charming petting farm where children can interact with friendly goats, sheep, rabbits, and other farm animals.

items.name: Creature Feature Encounter
items.short_description: An educational centre offering hands-on encounters with reptiles, insects, and small mammals, supervised by expert handlers.

items.name: Isle of Man Bird Sanctuary
items.short_description: A sanctuary dedicated to local and migratory birds, with large aviaries and opportunities to observe various species up close.

items.name: Douglas Pier Carousel
items.short_description: A classic seaside carousel with beautifully decorated horses and chariots, offering nostalgic fun for all ages on the promenade.

items.name: The Douglas Dragon Coaster
items.short_description: A thrilling, family-friendly roller coaster with gentle dips and turns, themed around an ancient Manx dragon legend.
items.address: Funland Park, Central Promenade, Douglas, IM2 4LP

items.name: Ferris Wheel of Man
items.short_description: Enjoy panoramic views of Douglas Bay and the surrounding landscape from this iconic Ferris wheel.

items.name: Jumpin' Jellyfish Tower
items.short_description: A gentle drop tower ride that slowly lifts young adventurers up, then descends with a soft bounce, mimicking a floating jellyfish.
items.address: Seafront Arcade, Loch Promenade, Douglas, IM1 2LY

items.name: Manx Cat & Friends Meet-up
items.short_description: Meet and greet with friendly local cartoon characters, including the famous Manx Cat, for photos and fun interactions.
items.address: Douglas Grand Hall, Lord Street, Douglas, IM1 2JB

items.name: Enchanted Forest Characters
items.short_description: Step into an enchanted forest setting to meet beloved fairy tale characters and participate in story time sessions.
items.address: The Secret Garden Venue, Onchan, Douglas, IM3 1ND

items.name: Superhero Training Academy
items.short_description: Train alongside your favourite superheroes, learn some moves, and get your picture taken with the caped crusaders.
items.address: Douglas Arena, Peel Road, Douglas, IM1 5PF

items.name: Ocean Pals Parade
items.short_description: A lively parade and meet & greet with colourful ocean-themed cartoon characters like Ollie the Octopus and Shelly the Starfish.
items.address: Douglas Promenade (near Sea Terminal), Douglas, IM1 2BT

items.name: Douglas Berry Farm & Play
items.short_description: Pick your own seasonal berries, explore a hay bale maze, and enjoy a tractor ride around the farm.

items.name: The Millbrook Farm Experience
items.short_description: A working farm where kids can learn about farm life, feed animals, and witness daily farming tasks like milking or sheepdog demonstrations.

items.name: Pumpkin Patch & Maize Maze
items.short_description: A seasonal attraction (autumn) where families can pick their own pumpkins and navigate a giant maize maze.

items.name: Tiny Tiller's Garden Club
items.short_description: An interactive garden and mini-farm for young children to learn about growing vegetables, planting flowers, and caring for a small plot.
items.address: Noble's Park Community Gardens, Douglas, IM2 4BP

items.name: Isle of Man Pirate Quest
items.short_description: An outdoor scavenger hunt along the Douglas coastline, solving riddles to find hidden pirate treasure. Map and clues provided.
items.address: Start at Sea Terminal, Douglas, IM1 2BX

items.name: Wizard's Apprentice Labyrinth
items.short_description: An immersive indoor maze with magical puzzles and challenges, where young apprentices help a wizard recover lost spells.
items.address: The Old School House, Douglas, IM1 2AQ

items.name: Forest Explorer's Challenge
items.short_description: An outdoor adventure course with ropes, bridges, and zip lines, designed to test bravery and agility in a natural woodland setting.

items.name: Escape Room for Little Detectives
items.short_description: A specially designed escape room adventure with age-appropriate puzzles and a friendly mystery to solve, perfect for younger minds.

items.name: Fairytale Isle Park
items.short_description: A magical theme park where classic fairy tales come to life with gentle rides, character meet-and-greets, and enchanting shows.
items.address: Just off Peel Road, Douglas, IM4 4QF

items.name: Douglas Dino Land
items.short_description: Travel back in time to an era of dinosaurs! Features animatronic dinosaurs, fossil digs, and a themed train ride.

items.name: Mini Racers Speedway
items.short_description: A high-octane park for budding drivers, with go-karts, mini-bumper cars, and a small track for remote-control car racing.

items.name: World of Imagination Douglas
items.short_description: A unique theme park where kids' drawings come to life through interactive projections, virtual reality experiences, and creative play zones.

items.name: Douglas Sea Life Centre
items.short_description: Explore the wonders of the ocean with stunning displays of local marine life, tropical fish, and an immersive underwater tunnel.

items.name: Touch Pool & Tidepool Explorers
items.short_description: A hands-on experience where children can gently touch starfish, crabs, and other resilient creatures found in local tide pools.
items.address: South Quay Heritage Centre, Douglas, IM1 5LF

items.name: Shipwreck Shark Lagoon
items.short_description: Observe various shark species and other large predators swimming around a recreated shipwreck, through massive viewing windows.
items.address: Douglas Oceanarium, Peel Road, Douglas, IM1 5NB

items.name: Jellyfish Kaleidoscope
items.short_description: A mesmerising exhibition dedicated to jellyfish, featuring beautifully lit tanks and interactive displays about their life cycles.
items.address: Douglas Waterfront Centre, Strand Street, Douglas, IM1 2AF
